trans-unit.source: Represents a WQL *ASSOCIATORS OF* data query.
It can be used for both instances and schema queries.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery"></xref> class.
If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.
In this case, the query is assumed to be an instance query.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The query string or the path of the source object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery"></xref> class for the given source object and related class.
The query is assumed to be an instance query (as opposed to a schema query).
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The path of the source object for this query.
The related objects' class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery"></xref> class for a schema query using the given set of parameters.
This constructor is used for schema queries only: the first parameter must be set to `true` .
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
`true` to indicate that this is a schema query; otherwise, `false` .
The path of the source class.
The related objects' required base class.
The relationship type.
The qualifier required to be present on the related objects.
The qualifier required to be present on the relationships.
The role that the related objects are required to play in the relationship.
The role that the source class is required to play in the relationship.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.RelatedObjectQuery"></xref> class for the given set of parameters.
The query is assumed to be an instance query (as opposed to a schema query).
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The path of the source object.
The related objects' required class.
The relationship type.
The qualifier required to be present on the related objects.
The qualifier required to be present on the relationships.
The role that the related objects are required to play in the relationship.
The role that the source object is required to play in the relationship.
`true` to return only the class definitions of the related objects; otherwise, false .
Builds the query string according to the current property values.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Gets or sets a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions be returned.
This parameter is only valid for instance queries.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag.
Property Value
`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions are to be returned.
Creates a copy of the object.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The copied object.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a schema query or an instance query.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type.
Property Value
`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value indicating whether this is a schema query.
Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
The query string to be parsed.
Gets or sets the class of the endpoint objects (the related class).
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new related class.
Property Value
A string containing the related class name.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the related class name.
Gets or sets a qualifier required to be defined on the related objects.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new qualifier.
Property Value
A string containing the name of the qualifier required on the related objects.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the name of the qualifier required on the related object.
Gets or sets the role that the related objects returned should be playing in the relationship.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new role.
Property Value
A string containing the role of the related objects.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the role of the related objects.
Gets or sets the type of relationship (association).
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new relationship class.
Property Value
A string containing the relationship class name.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the relationship class name.
Gets or sets a qualifier required to be defined on the relationship objects.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new qualifier.
Property Value
A string containing the name of the qualifier required on the relationship objects.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the name of the qualifier required on the relationship objects.
Gets or sets the source object to be used for the query.
For instance queries, this is typically an instance path.
For schema queries, this is typically a class name.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new source object.
Property Value
A string representing the path of the object to be used for the query.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the path of the object to be used for the query.
Gets or sets the role that the source object should be playing in the relationship.
Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new role.
Property Value
A string containing the role of this object.
.NET Framework Security
Full trust for the immediate caller.
This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> value containing the role of this object.
